statements: DELETE FROM SwimmerPerformanceTracking WHERE swimmer_name = 'Alice' AND swimmer_age = 20;
DELETE FROM SwimmerPerformanceTracking WHERE swimmer_id = 101 AND swimmer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM SwimmerPerformanceTracking WHERE swim_event = '100m Freestyle' AND swimmer_age > 20 AND swimmer_gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM Performances WHERE Event = '100m Butterfly' AND Time < '01:00.00';
DELETE FROM Swimmers WHERE Age > 25 AND Team = 'Team A';
DELETE FROM SwimTimes WHERE event='100m Butterfly';
DELETE FROM Results WHERE competition_id = 1 AND swimmer_id = 2;
DELETE FROM Results WHERE event_id = 3 AND time < 25.5;
DELETE FROM Performances WHERE rank > 3 AND swimmer_id = 101;
